nodes.text: A set of six promotional posters was sent to real-world journalists in September 2014 as part of the HoloNet News promotion for the then-upcoming animated television series Star Wars Rebels. Stylized as in-universe wanted posters, each depicted a member of the Ghost crew, a group of rebels against the Galactic Empire. Included with the posters was a card featuring a canonical communiqué issued by HNN Bureau Chief Eris Harro and Minister of Information Pollux Hax, with the flip side of the card giving information on the premiere of Star Wars Rebels.
